articles.description: Britain's Tom Pidcock defies a puncture to retain his Olympic mountain bike title in astonishing fashion in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics mountain bike: Tom Pidcock wins astonishing gold after fighting back from puncture

articles.description: Great Britain retain their Olympic team eventing title to win the nation's first gold medal at the Paris 2024 Games.
articles.title: Olympics eventing: Great Britain retain team title for nation's first gold of Paris Games

articles.description: Great Britain win their first gold medal of the Paris Olympics on day three of the 2024 Games.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Top five stories from day three of Paris Games

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Arsenal complete the signing of Bologna and Italy defender Riccardo Calafiori for a fee of up to £42m.
articles.title: Riccardo Calafiori: Arsenal sign Italy defender from Bologna

articles.description: Tom Daley wins his fifth Olympic medal with a superb silver alongside Noah Williams in the men's synchronised 10m platform in Paris.
articles.title: Tom Daley wins fifth medal alongside Noah Williams with silver in Paris

articles.description: Adam Peaty tests positive for Covid-19 a day after winning silver for Team GB in the 100m breaststroke.
articles.title: Adam Peaty: GB swimmer tests positive for Covid-19 after winning Olympic silver medal

articles.description: Fulham reach an agreement with Arsenal to sign midfielder Emile Smith Rowe for an initial £27m plus a potential £7m in add-ons.
articles.title: Emile Smith Rowe: Fulham agree club record deal for Arsenal midfielder

articles.description: Novak Djokovic outclasses long-time rival Rafael Nadal to win their Olympic second-round match and continue his bid to land an elusive gold medal.
articles.title: Olympics tennis: Novak Djokovic beats Rafael Nadal at Paris 2024
